summary:
Product growth leader, with 8 years of experience in running, and scaling digital demand generation (organic search, PPC, email, reviews, events), and teams for product-led businesses Xero, Tradify, and A2X, Translucent now at leading EOR Horizons.

I’ve built my career off of strategically building future demand (laying foundations), and harvesting existing demand (identifying quick-wins) with a deep understanding of modern digital marketing acquisition strategies, and tactics.

Practicing what I preach, in 2017 I co-founded Paintvine, and built this to become New Zealand's largest creative events business hosting over 2000+ events annually, and in 2021 I co-founded Paidnice (fmr. Latechaser), the market leader in late fee automation for Xero & QuickBooks SMEs.

Previously, during the covid-19 lockdown, I created New Zealand's leading food delivery directory, delivereat. Acquired in 2020 by MOBI.

To support NZ's digital transformation, I partnered with the Ministry of Business, Employment and Innovation to build The Right Tool™ a locally focused app and service marketplace tailored for Kiwi SMEs. Acquired in 2022 by TUANZ.

Accredited member of the Marketing Association of New Zealand, The Institute of Directors in New Zealand (Inc) and the New Zealand Events Association.

➔ denym.com

treasury_media.title: Jumping into joy of the unknown
treasury_media.description: New Zealander Denym Bird is not only living in Amsterdam, but running his own business too, at age 29.

treasury_media.description: A marketplace for Kiwi SMEs to find the right software apps and tools to help them run their business.

treasury_media.title: Directory of 'indie NZ food deliveries' proving popular
treasury_media.description: More than 280 food producers are still delivering during the lockdown.

projects.title: The Coachseek Podcast
projects.description: I helped develop 'The Coachseek Podcast' after the massively positive response we received from our Top 50 Influential Coaches for 2015 list. With the aim of digging deeper into the individual stories of each coach and finding real actionable & powerful advice our coaching community could get value from. At the same time experimenting with a different form of multi-media to gain exposure for our Coachseek Management Tool.

projects.title: The Sports Coaching Business Survival Guide - eBook
projects.description: After learning that our target audience engages and share more longer form content vs shorter form. I developed 'The Sports Coaching Business Survival Guide' eBook to help drive problem aware & unaware leads to our Coachseek Management Tool. While also adding a richer thought leadership in sports coaching.

projects.title: CoachingBulletin.com - Newsletter
projects.description: I created 'CoachingBulletin.com' as a way of driving problem unaware leads to our Coachseek Management Tool. The email newsletter focused on sports coaching news is delivered weekly into a growing audience of over 2000+ sports coaches from all around the world.

projects.title: Top 50 Influential Sports Coaches for 2015
projects.description: I created the 'Top 50 Influential Sports Coaches for 2015' list as a way of recognising coaching excellence & also to test leveraging social circle of others to gain brand exposure and drive leads to Coachseek's Management Tool. I successfully achieved 3100 social shares and drove 50,000+ unique site visits to our list.

projects.title: Tradify Case Study Videos
projects.description:
I planned and travelled across three countries to create 6 unique case study videos with Tradify customers from the United Kingdom, Australia and New Zealand. 

+ Crafted emotional messaging targeting our buyer personas.
+ Sourced freelancers in 3 countries to complete work up to brand and company standards.
+ Lead and managed the entire project from beginning to end on time and on budget.

profile_positions.description: The worlds most trusted partner for hiring globally.
profile_positions.title: Senior Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: Late fee automation software, that is quickly becoming the leading Xero & QuickBooks add-on helping SMEs get paid quicker through automated late fees & discounts on top of existing invoices.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder / Director

profile_positions.description: New Zealand's original, largest, most loved (NPS of 90+) paint and sip event business. We run over 1000+ events annually in 20+ locations across 15 Kiwi cities, hosted by 70+ amazing artists.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder / Director

profile_positions.description: Took Translucent from 0 to 1, launched the brand world to and setup the systems to generate 100s of leads per month. Translucent is the CFO super-app that solves the everyday problems of multi-entity finance teams. #multientity
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: Led a team of demand generation experts, we leveraged best-in-class SaaS marketing tactics and strategies that have drove A2X from 0 to well over 12,000 customers, and 2000+ 5 star reviews.
profile_positions.title: Growth

profile_positions.description: Built a Kiwi focused app and services marketplace, built-in collaboration with MBIE's Small Business Digital Boost™ initiative. The Right Tool™ lets Kiwi business owners to find, evaluate and rate apps that they need for their industry, and that work here in New Zealand. Acquired in 2022 by TUANZ.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder (Acquired by TUANZ)

profile_positions.description: During the covid-19 lockdown, my friend Alex Hamilton I built New Zealand's leading food delivery directory, delivereat. Helping over half a million Kiwis connect with over 1000+ independent businesses that were delivering during lockdown and beyond. Acquired shortly after by MOBI (formerly Mobi2go).
profile_positions.title: Founder (Acquired by MOBI)

profile_positions.description: Built Australia's first regulated platform for retail investors to buy Bitcoin through regular weekly payments (DCA, dollar-cost averaging). After 3 years of working with my co-founders to find product-market fit, we were unable to make the business viable long term.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description: #3 hire, during my time at Tradify I worked to build out the growth team and to successfully scale the business from $500k of revenue to $5m of annual recurring revenue.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Specialist

profile_positions.description: First 'real' job. My role was to accelerate the growth of Coachseek. We helped 2000+ sports coaches in 40 countries across the world manage their businesses better through our SaaS product.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

volunteer_experiences.description: Assisting, promote and plan the annual Daffodil Day street appeal for the Pakakura collection area.
Volunteer consulting and advisory on Social Media content distribution to Citizen Advice Bureau of New Zealand.
